title: To allow United States nationals and permanent residents to visit family members in Cuba, and for other purposes.
content: Cuban-American Family Rights Restoration Act - Prohibits that President from regulating or prohibiting: (1) travel to or from Cuba by any US person. Or (2) transactions incident to travel for the purpose of visiting a close relative who is a national of Cuba. Directs the President to rescind all regulations that so regulate or prohibit such travel or transactions.
